xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Notes to Financial Results: 1. Both EPS Calculated considering exceptional item Notes to Cash Flow: 1. Changes in Trade and Other Receivables have been shown under Adjustments for decrease (increase) in trade receivables, current 2. Changes in Trade and Other Payables have been shown under Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current 3. Cash and Cash equivalents at the beginning of the period includes Rs 24 crore due to addition of subsidiaries
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: 1. Exceptional item is adjusted in Other Unallocable Expenditure net off Unallocable income 2. Q4 FY21 Segment Revenue includes Rs 17,199 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 1,54,896 crore 3. FY21 Segment Revenue includes Rs 52,912 crore GST recovered. Net Revenue is Rs 4,86,326 crore 4. Segment results for Oil-to-Chemicals, Retail and Financial Services segments includes Interest income pertaining to the respective segments 5. Segment results for the Financial Services segment includes finance cost relating to the segment. 6. The difference between finance cost in financial results and segment information is on account of finance cost relating to financial services segment. 7. Segment assets and liabilities have been grossed up, with respect to advance from customers, bill discounting and other non-current assets whereas the same are netted off in the respective heads of Balance Sheet.
